name: Openspace Ventures
description:
Openspace is a venture capital firm using active intelligence to find and back Southeast Asian companies creating a transformative impact where tech meets life.

By focusing on the fundamentals and with a wide-scale operations team, we actively partner with over 40 portfolio companies to help build viable and responsible B2B and B2C businesses.

Notable companies in the portfolio include Gojek/GoTo (led Series A), Kumu, Biofourmis, Halodoc, FinAccel, Love, Bonito and Finnomena.

It is headquartered in Singapore, with active offices in Jakarta, Bangkok, Manila, and Ho Chi Minh City.
